long_description: Offering excellent hardtail performance on singletrack, the Cannondale Tango SL 29er 2 women's mountain bike features very good Shimano components, fast 29 in. wheels and a sturdy reinforced frame. Women-specific design is optimized for a great fit on large 29er bikes with a frame design that offers a low stand-over height. 6061 aluminum frame features sturdy, butted tubes and shaped chainstays and seatstays to improve efficiency and comfort. SL version features a reinforced triangle in the front of the frame and an oversize 1.5 in. headtube and fork steerer to enhance strength, rigidity and steering precision. RockShox 30 Gold suspension fork delivers 80mm of travel with lockout to help smooth the trails; size-specific springs deliver optimized performance. Shimano Deore trigger shifters control the Deore front derailleur and Shimano SLX rear derailleur for precise, easy shifts through the 30 gears. Shimano M446 hydraulic disc brakes use a 180mm rotor up front and a 160mm rotor in the back to supply quick, powerful speed management in all conditions. Maddux DC3.0 rims are outfitted with versatile, fast-rolling Schwalbe Rabid Rob tires to provide confident handling and traction. Platform pedals mean no special bike shoes are required. Specs on the Cannondale Tango SL 29er 2 women's hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
short_description: Offering excellent hardtail performance on singletrack, the Cannondale Tango SL 29er 2 women's mountain bike features very good Shimano components, fast 29 in. wheels and a sturdy reinforced frame.
